website_summaries.verdict: A stylish choice that gets high marks for ease of installation, as well as smooth and quiet operation.
pros: This option comes with great instructions and is easy to install
Great, modern look and super quiet operation
cons: Some buyers report problems with the fan suddenly dying after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: Hunter five blade fan
customer_reviews.text: The fan runs well. There is a big difference between third speed and second speed. When it is on high-speed the fan moves a lot of air and is quiet. Cons: fan comes with decorative lights with Mini threads. I ended up not using them, and instead went out and bought LED lights to replace them. I believe that they are brighter, and use a lot less electricity. I only gave this review four stars because the screws to mount the fan to the box were missing, and I had to spend a few minutes looking through a jar of screws to find What I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip M

customer_reviews.title: Hunter fan quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased and installed a few ceiling fans in my life. First Hunter. This level of quality and quiet and easy installation. The installation is well thought out by their engineers. Anyone has installed fans will know what I mean. After install, I wanted to order another but the price went up tremendously. I am in communication with the supplier attempting to get another. This fan will not disappoint. It comes with the 3 bulbs, but I ordered led daylight bulbs because I have become used to this level of light now. Daylight led's are throughout my home.
customer_reviews.author: online is great

customer_reviews.title: niceee!
customer_reviews.text: installed 2 of these. very nice quality. inlike how both sides of the blades are white. we changed the bulbs to smart bulbs, but the original ones weren’t a bad color. i like the quality detail from the decals on the pull strings to the blade holders. two issues, but not major, we couldnt figure out which way the blade should face , so we did the same and made the markings face up on the blades , 2nd issue i didnt receive any screws to hold the motor into the base, but i made it work with some other screws i found around the house. it took me about 45min each fan, to put up fyi..
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: One is awesome and one clicks...
customer_reviews.text: I went to say I live this fan but then remembered one didn’t work and we needed an exchange. And one of the two of them clicks when in operation. So... Maybe it’s not so fantastic. But it is still operating after four years. We had to have a professional do the insulation as it didn’t seem to be very easy, but we are not good at home repairs so I wouldn’t utilize us as a baseline.
customer_reviews.author: Stopthemad

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion, lacks power and moves very little air.
customer_reviews.text: Was not happy at all with this product. It lacks power and on full blast I hardly feel anything. I am confused as to what the other reviewers were talking about? After paying for install, it's not even worth it to uninstall it and return it. That's the thing with these fans.. you don't know how they work until you pay to have someone install it and then unfortunately find out the reality. I have a Casablanca fan in my place as well and that thing works fantastic and really moves air. I wouldn't recommend this fan though.
customer_reviews.author: Sliderguy

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this fan sharp looking, it is so quiet I don't even know it's running except for the cool breeze. I bought one for the kitchen and loved the way it looked so I immediately bought a second one for my bedroom. Now I can sleep without hearing a fan running.Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Good ceiling fan for kitchen BUT
customer_reviews.text: This did not get installed immediately after purchase as there was other work that needed to be done first. Finally went up about a week ago and appeared to be all I wanted except the LED bulbs supplied with the fan burned out in just a few days. Annoying and inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... bought one for my 12 yo daughter's bedroom and loved it so much that we bought another a month ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for my 12 yo daughter's bedroom and loved it so much that we bought another a month later for 14 yo daughter's bedroom. It truly is whisper quiet, very attractive and a perfect fit for their small bedrooms with relatively low ceilings. We also love the pulls with icons so you know which one is light and which is fan. Great price for a quality Hunter fan, too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Eason

customer_reviews.title: Whisper quiet fan!
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a ceiling fan for my bedroom that was fairly quiet as I do not like "white" noise because it keeps me awake. This fan delivers on the low speed which is fine for me. Of course, the noise increases with each level of speed and that is to be expected. My bedroom is a 12 x 12 and the low speed, with the windows cracked open gives me air circulation and cools the room.
customer_reviews.author: Suess

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, no dust. I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this fan a year ago. It works great. It`s so quiet and Dust doesn`t settle on it. I really like this fan. The only issue I have Is all three lights turn on , I used to turn on 1 and then all three buy pulling the chain. But It`s okay.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: needed a low profile fan for bonus room reno. ...
customer_reviews.text: needed a low profile fan for bonus room reno...works well, nothing fancy and some rattling when run on high....also, the directions do NOT clearly state how to remove light kit...the electrician couldn't figure it out... ummmm okay so I did and showed him the little screws holding the light kit to the rest of the guts of it... wow, little lady that just might work!! <insert eyeroll here>
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: and so far I'm very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, and so far I'm very happy with them. One of them seems to be a little loose and makes noise on the highest setting, but the other one doesn't, so it's probably due to installation error (we'll check it out eventually). These are small but effective, beautiful, and low profile. Exactly what we needed in our spare bedrooms!
customer_reviews.author: sepania

customer_reviews.title: One year and light stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Exactly one year after we installed this ceiling fan the light stopped working. Guess what...Hunter does not have light kits to fit this fan. So now we have to buy a whole new fan and light. Guess what brand it's not going to be.
customer_reviews.author: J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Impossible Ceiling Bracket
customer_reviews.text: Unlike Hunter fans I have ought and installed over the years, this one provided a ceiling bracket which could not fit the ceiling box outlet. I could not find a web site or person to contact with Hunter to remedy the situation so I had to return it and buy another brand. Lot of hassle for such a stupid production mistake by Hunter. I would be reluctant to purchase or recommend another Hunter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little fan
customer_reviews.text: The fan works, which is a big improvement over my old one. Bonus: my old fan was from the same manufacturer as the old one, and I didn't have to buy a new remote because the old one works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo1109

customer_reviews.title: There are three settings for the fan. The fastest ...
customer_reviews.text: Fan failed after less than 2 years. Called Hunter and they said it was some wire harness/capacitor combo that blew due to a power surge or something else. I have other fans running that are 10 years old that were not affected by this supposed power surge. The fan before this one lasted close to 10 years as well....hmm. This replacement part is not covered under the motor warranty that they claim is lifetime. Wanted to charge me $20 for the part, but it wouldnt be available for 3 more weeks. Tough to swallow that given the high heat of July. Will not be purchasing any more Hunter fans.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Hunter 52087 Hatherton 46" Fan
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, quiet, powerful and the lights are bright enough for a small bedroom. Used the Hunter 99122 Universal 3 speed remote with it, works great. No need to rewire just used existing 14-2 wire with this remote.
customer_reviews.author: 2hawk feathers

customer_reviews.title: Moves the air and very quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little fan! Easy to install. Runs quiet and moves the air around the room. We bought this to replace a fan in a relatively small room with a puny fan - probably 38" - that just wasn't doing the job. Very pleased with this Hunter fan and have ordered a second one to go in the spare bedroom. Note, I have bought and installed probably 20+ hunter fans over the years at the various houses we've lived in - always easy to install and worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P

customer_reviews.title: Love Hunter fans
customer_reviews.text: Can hardly go wrong with Hunter. Extremely quiet, virtually silent. Even at high speed, design of blades eliminates whirring and other noises associated with cheaper brands. (And frankly, it was only a very few dollars more than the cheapest.)
customer_reviews.author: James Paul Tindilia

customer_reviews.title: Noiseless & beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Quiet and really gets the air going at multiple levels. The lights are nice and bright too. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Quality Fans
customer_reviews.text: These fans are very well made and easy to install. We hired an electrician to hang the fans and are pleased with the results. Price point was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Fan!
customer_reviews.text: Most attractive fan I've ever bought. Looks fantastic in a situation that warrants a white fan. Deathly quiet too! I don't use any remotes so I can't comment on that technology regarding this fan. Assembly was straight forward and typical. I highly recommend this fan and would buy it again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Vince Neil

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: The fans are very nice for the price. .look great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good fan
customer_reviews.text: Great fan! Nice quality. Quiet. Keeps us cool without having to put on the air conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Monroe

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FAN GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I bought THREE of these over a year ago. ALL THREE ARE WORKING PERFECTLY.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: They are nice and close to the ceiling - so they don't ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for bedrooms. They are nice and close to the ceiling - so they don't hang too low into the room. They are very quiet and still move a lot of air when on high or medium speed. The lights are not terribly bright, but do a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Beamwalker

customer_reviews.title: Efficient fan for medium sized rooms
customer_reviews.text: Works well in my 12' by 12' office with 9' ceiling at medium speed circulating air quietly and efficiently. At high speed the fan generates air speed noise. The very white color works well in my office which has a very white ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whisper quiet, excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I had mine professionally installed. It does a good job
customer_reviews.author: Julie Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase for this!
customer_reviews.text: After installing it kept making. Clicking noise and all 3 of the glass light covers where shattered into tiny pieces I had to go by 3 more
customer_reviews.author: MARISSA ZIMMERMAN

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy install
customer_reviews.text: Received fan, started at 7:00. Including removal of old fan, finished by 8:30 same night. Works perfectly, balanced out of the box. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL. I love how they have a more modern ...
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL. I love how they have a more modern look, not the usual fan blade shape. Only odd thing is the choice to use small-base lightbulbs, but whatever, looks BEAUTIFUL. Really brightens up the room. wonderful to have in winter and summer.
customer_reviews.author: Writer & Mom of Four

customer_reviews.title: q
customer_reviews.text: Installed very easily. Works great. Looks good. Very quiet. I'm very happy with it. The only knock I have on it is that I installed it with a Luton wall switch and I had to guess on which of the wires on the fan unit was for the light and which was for the fan as they are not identified on the unit or in the instructions manual. But I guessed right the first time, so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Martin L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan with light
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fan. Really quiet and very easy to install. The only thing is one of the bulbs was burned out so I'll have to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Ceiling Fans
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. I have them in all three bedrooms. Very quiet and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Arlie Hixson

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: These fans are great. Fully met my expectations. I would recommend Hunter fans to anyone. Quite, dependable and great looking.
customer_reviews.author: Prez.

customer_reviews.title: Whisper quite and great looks. It came on time and as expected
customer_reviews.text: Whisper quite and great looks. It came on time and as expected. A little tip for installing: Make sure you rotate the fan housing at least ten times before you install it. Any grinding or loose sounding fans should be returned and replaced. This tip helps you avoid the absolute frustration of a complete install which needs to be taken down because on the "one bad Apple in a thousand" that comes with these types of products.
customer_reviews.author: Ell Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great fan! Easy to install and very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Great fan! Easy to install and very quiet. I had a very old Hunter fan in my last house and loved it, so no I am loyal customer and am not disappointed with this fan at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works great. Quiet and good light. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: S Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: We just installed the fan and it is so quiet. Perfectly balanced with no vibration. My husband is an electrician, so that helps with installation but it was no problem. Beautiful, quiet fan!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear instructions. No missing parts. Sturdy, QUIET, absolutely no wobble. Good price. LOVE this fan.
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace an old fan. This was similar in size and appearance. The instructions for replacement were CRYSTAL CLEAR. Imagine that! No missing parts. Sturdy fan. Quiet. REALLY quiet. No wobble at all--NONE. Surface of the blades and fan are very smooth and so will be easy to keep clean. I LOVE this fan.
customer_reviews.author: mistyake

customer_reviews.title: Love the bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Have it in the kitchen. Love the bulbs. Previously had one with the dome lighting. Kitchen was too dark. With these three bulbs, the kitchen is nice & bright.
customer_reviews.author: Irene5

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the fan. It truly brightens up our guest room. It looks great.
customer_reviews.author: dgroat

customer_reviews.title: Hunter Hatherton 46 inch ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality fan at a very fair price point. It is well made and very easy to install. Perfect for a small area and with the 5 wide blades it throws a bunch of air! Light kit is even included. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Larry A Miner

customer_reviews.title: Cool breeze
customer_reviews.text: This fan lives up to expectations. It is very quiet. It provides a very good flow of air at all speeds. It installed without any problems. The price is reasonable. What more could you ask?
customer_reviews.author: Ronald T. Roseborough

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great fan!
customer_reviews.text: These are even more beautiful than the photos. Easy to install and super quiet while running. Truly happy with all 5 fans that I purchased and had installed! Would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Kiddy Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love that the motor is reversible
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly sized for my room. Effective yet unobtrusive. Love that the motor is reversible!
customer_reviews.author: cmaibusch

customer_reviews.title: How much you like these fans will depend on what you are looking ...
customer_reviews.text: How much you like these fans will depend on what you are looking for in the first place, right? We wanted close to ceiling mounts, white color, decent light and a size that would be visually appropriate for the rooms. These fans work perfectly for us and we have them in 2 rooms.
customer_reviews.author: DaveK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small areas
customer_reviews.text: Needed a smaller fan for my laundry area and this one fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bonkerz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the bracket wasnt tapped correctly called hunter and they expressed a replacement immediately fan works very well
customer_reviews.author: walter d hennie

customer_reviews.title: This fan is great! I purchased it because my last fan had ...
customer_reviews.text: This fan is great! I purchased it because my last fan had a horrible rattling sound and I have had absolutely no problems with this fan or it's noise. Upon opening the box, I discovered the one of the glass globes had an unsightly crack in it, but I contacted support and they replaced it timely and professionally. Overall I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars only because I had to return this fan as the light are the small 'flame' type that wouldn't work in our space.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel W. Siciliano Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep room cooler in summer heat.
customer_reviews.text: This fan was a great price and helps keep our bedroom much cooler in the summer heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mothers birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good fixture but haven't used it yet
customer_reviews.author: Steve Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I have always had satisfaction with Hunter fans and this is no exception. A great value. TOTALLY quiet. Perfect for my home office.
customer_reviews.author: John W Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Clean, quiet with good air flow. Easy installation. It's a smaller fan but puts out plenty of breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Mark The Celt

customer_reviews.title: Fan of fan!
customer_reviews.text: I did hire a professional to install but he had no problems whatsoever. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Mattimore

customer_reviews.title: Hunter Fan
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the fan. It looks nice and is very quiet. The electrician that installed it said I had made an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, sturdy, and aesthetically pleasing!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these. They look exactly as advertised. They are also very quiet, which is a plus! Very fair for the price. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Broken from manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Fan came broken and no one is willing to replace the broken part.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a very pretty fan, and is exactly what I was wanting.
customer_reviews.author: D'Arla Nowlin

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, great price
customer_reviews.text: Fan looks and works great, purchased for my daughter's room. 2 of the included bulbs did not work so I will need to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Babarra

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After an hour of running motor got extremely hot and started putting out an odor.
customer_reviews.author: Big Blue

customer_reviews.title: New Hunter Fan.
customer_reviews.text: SO QUITE!!!!! Love it. Replaced fan that was old and noisy.
customer_reviews.author: joan destefano

customer_reviews.title: pretty fan and we like it
customer_reviews.text: works well, pretty fan and we like it. Looks good on our ceiling in the kitchen. It's quiet also.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, and we now have good light to play ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, and we now have good light to play cards! It was easy to install (65 yrs young)
customer_reviews.author: Chris Updyke

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fan but unfortunately the bulbs were bad.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Bought a couple months ago and just installed. The lights stopped working after 2 hours. Now it’s passed my return window.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this to use in a small bedroom to ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use in a small bedroom to be used as an art studio. It provides adequate light and circulates the air well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Panutsos

customer_reviews.title: ... put one in the baby room and it's so nice and quiet
customer_reviews.text: We put one in the baby room and it's so nice and quiet. We loved it so much that we put one in our room.
customer_reviews.author: Alison G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it it works great came in ample time
customer_reviews.author: sandra scheel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is great, low noise and low profile. I can't speak to the installation as I had a handyman take care of that. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Hunter's Hatherton 46-inch low-profile ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one to test and see if we liked. We now have THREE of these installed and went for a similar 42-inch in our master bathroom. All work with dimmer switches, were relatively easy to install and are super quiet. They are perfect in our home that doesn't have high ceilings. Great upgrades. Why oh why did we wait so long.
customer_reviews.author: GP Millward

customer_reviews.title: I needed a mid-size fan for the room and this one was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and looks lovely in my daughters room. I needed a mid-size fan for the room and this one was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: YKMR

customer_reviews.title: This fan is really very nice, very quiet
customer_reviews.text: This fan is really very nice, very quiet. And it is sufficient for our kids room size 13ft x 10ft room.
customer_reviews.author: smodekurti

customer_reviews.title: Super Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan to replace another Hunter fan that was 10 years old but had a dim light kit that couldn't be upgraded. The old fan was nice and quiet, but this new one is absolutely silent when on low. At high speed, all you hear are the blades moving through the air. The motor is so quiet. Simple and clear installation. Nice bright lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Atnbirdie

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Man, I love Hunter fans! I have never had a problem with Hunters, and have almost always had problems with other brands. Haven't bought one in a while, but just moved and needed some new fans - quality seems as good as ever, and instructions are better than ever! REALLY easy to follow and install! If anyone from Hunter reads this; keep up the good work. (But get some new design people in there - you're looking a little stale in that department.)
customer_reviews.author: Marti DiBergi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice, very quite and I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise great.
customer_reviews.text: Wiring was not the right color coded,Had a hard time matching wires,Otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ceiling fan for our guest bedroom. Easy to install and looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our bedroom. We have low ceilings and it's perfect. So very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Vartko

customer_reviews.title: Nice investment!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my purchase. This fan is so durable and well made. It is very quiet and does a tremendous job cooling off the room. We invested a little bit for this product but I am a firm believer in "you get what you pay for" You want a cheap fan then you get a cheap cool. This fan is worth every penny we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its annoying to have the hum in the early morning
customer_reviews.text: I am having trouble getting the hum out of this product. I wrote to Hunter asking for assistance but they never responded. Its annoying to have the hum in the early morning.. I thought better of the Hunter brand.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Foster

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought a Hunter the first time!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is great. Installation was easy. No balance weights required. It is very quiet on all speeds. On low speed you can't hear it at all. Bought it to replace a Westinghouse 42" fan that wobbled and squeaked. The mounting bracket on this Hunter fan is twice the size. Well worth the price. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dan J

customer_reviews.title: No ceiling is perfect so there should be a way to adjust the ...
customer_reviews.text: The fan works okay, however the top cover does not meet the ceiling evenly. No ceiling is perfect so there should be a way to adjust the top cover to meet the ceiling. Perhaps the bracket that connects the assembly to the electrical box should be adjustable after the top cover is on. Also, I hate the tiny screws they use and the way they are suppose to screw into the electrical bracket, it is so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Razz

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about it but there bulbs they sent work ...
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it but there bulbs they sent work it. We cannot find out what watt they are if we want to replace them out get dimmer bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ullrich

customer_reviews.title: If I could give it 0 stars I would. ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it 0 stars I would. The fan broke after 43 days in use. Going with Minka-aire instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ella's mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fan is working beautifully and it's soooo quiet. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Super Secretary

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Fan motor was DOA. Light fixture had a short as well. Sent unit back. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Victor J. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, it gives to the ceilings, and a more complete look to the rooms.
customer_reviews.text: Have these in the master bedroom and living room. Looking forward to having them working during the warmer weather. Since I am unable to have A/C, because of allergies, the fans will be a big help moving the air around, and I won't have to hide in a closet, to keep cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute ceiling hugger fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice ceiling fan for the money. The globes for the lights are my favorite part--a clean, contemporary look.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Snyder

product_meta.title: Hunter Fan Company Hunter 52087 Transitional 46``Ceiling Fan from Hatherton collection in White finish, inch
product_meta.description: The Hunter Fan Company. A Commitment to Excellence for Over 100 Years. Our heritage of 19th-century craftsmanship, combined with 21st-century design and innovation, ensures that every product we make is as tough on the inside as it is beautiful on the outside. Backed by our tradition of excellence, you know you can count on everything Hunter makes for unmatched quality, style and whisper-quiet performance. Save up to 47% on cooling costs by using ceiling fans and raising your thermostat 6 degrees in summer. (Your savings may differ depending upon your geographic location, housing characteristics and cost of energy.)
feature_bullets: WhisperWind motor delivers ultra-powerful air movement with whisper-quiet performance so you get the cooling power you want without the noise you don’t
Reversible motor allows you to change the direction of your fan from downdraft mode during the summer to updraft mode during the winter
13 degree blade pitch optimized to ensure ideal air movement and peak performance
Included pull chain allows for quick and easy on/off and speed adjustments
Limited Lifetime Motor Warranty is backed by the only company with over 125 years in the fan business

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars156 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
